verses.verse: And he made <S%H6213><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H2568><s%>, and five cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H7251><s%>, foursquare; and three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the height thereof <S%H6967><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of it <S%H7161><s%>; the horns thereof were of one piece with it <S%H6823><s%>: and he overlaid it with brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, the pots <S%H5518><s%>, and the shovels <S%H3257><s%>, and the basins <S%H4219><s%>, the flesh-hooks <S%H4207><s%>, and the firepans <S%H4289><s%>: all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof made <S%H6213><s%> he of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%> a grating <S%H4345><s%> of network <S%H7568><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, under the ledge round <S%H3749><s%> it beneath <S%H4295><s%>, reaching halfway up <S%H2677><s%>.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> for the four <S%H702><s%> ends <S%H7099><s%> of the grating <S%H4345><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, to be places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And he put <S%H935><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, wherewith to bear <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>; he made it hollow <S%H5014><s%> with planks <S%H3871><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the base <S%H3653><s%> thereof of brass <S%H5178><s%>, of the mirrors <S%H4759><s%> of the ministering <S%H6633><s%> women that ministered <S%H6633><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%>: for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> were of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>;

their pillars <S%H5982><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>, of brass <S%H5178><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> were of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, their pillars <S%H5982><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>, of brass <S%H5178><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and their fillets <S%H2838><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And for the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> were hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, their pillars <S%H5982><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and their fillets <S%H2838><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>.
And for the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the one side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate were fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>;

and so for the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H3802><s%>: on this hand and that hand by the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> were hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>.
All the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> were of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.

And the sockets <S%H134><s%> for the pillars <S%H5982><s%> were of brass <S%H5178><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and their fillets <S%H2838><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>; and the overlaying <S%H6826><s%> of their capitals <S%H7218><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>; and all the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> were filleted <S%H2836><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> was the work of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>: and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%>, and the height <S%H6967><s%> in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, answerable <S%H5980><s%> to the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>.

And their pillars <S%H5982><s%> were four <S%H702><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> four <S%H702><s%>, of brass <S%H5178><s%>; their hooks <S%H2053><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the overlaying <S%H6826><s%> of their capitals <S%H7218><s%>, and their fillets <S%H2838><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>.
And all the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, were of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

This <S%H428><s%> is the sum <S%H6485><s%> of the things for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, even the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, as they were counted <S%H6485><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, made <S%H6213><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And with him was Oholiab <S%H171><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach <S%H294><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, an engraver <S%H2796><s%>, and a skilful workman <S%H2803><s%>, and an embroiderer <S%H7551><s%> in blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in purple <S%H713><s%>, and in scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and in fine linen <S%H8336><s%>.

All the gold <S%H2091><s%> that was used <S%H6213><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> in all the work <S%H4399><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, even the gold <S%H2091><s%> of the offering <S%H8573><s%>, was twenty <S%H6242><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

And the silver <S%H3701><s%> of them that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>, and a thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore and fifteen <S%H7657><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>:

a beka <S%H1235><s%> a head <S%H1538><s%>, that is <S%H4276><s%>, half a shekel <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, for every one that passed <S%H5674><s%> over to them that were numbered <S%H6485><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, for six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty men <S%H2572><s%>.

And the hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> were for casting <S%H3332><s%> the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the veil <S%H6532><s%>; a hundred <S%H3967><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> for the hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>, a talent <S%H3603><s%> for a socket <S%H134><s%>.

And of the thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> shekels he made <S%H6213><s%> hooks <S%H2053><s%> for the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> their capitals <S%H7218><s%>, and made fillets for them <S%H2836><s%>.

And the brass <S%H5178><s%> of the offering <S%H8573><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>, and two thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>.

And therewith he made <S%H6213><s%> the sockets <S%H134><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and the brazen <S%H5178><s%> grating <S%H4345><s%> for it <S%H3627><s%>, and all the vessels of the altar <S%H4196><s%>,

and the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and all the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and all the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
